about_the_game:
You are an ALIEN, crash-landed on Earth with your crew. While obviously you weren't the one to crash the ship, you need to duke this out with your clearly guilty crew mates while also avoiding detection from humans. Once the humans start to catch on…ACT CASUAL! You don't want to get caught – or even better, you want to be the one with the humans' favor.

Act Casual is a chaotic multiplayer party game that combines intense ragdoll combat with moments of uneasy peace. Duke out your gripes with your alien crew while avoiding attention from the humans by maintaining disguises and surviving mini games in an array of ever changing stages.

As you adjust to this planet's gravity, fling your self around, be resourceful, and find unique ways to win.

Game Features:

  • Fight locally or online
  • Up to 8 players.
  • Ragdoll physics combat
  • Content rich game modes
  • Hilarious minigames
  • Dozens of unique weapons to discover and stages to fight in
  • Choose your character from our lovable extraterrestial cast
